name: Magic Runner
description:
This is the result of my curiosity to teach myself unity while being in quarantine. It is a small infinite runner. You can switch between the lanes with pressing A / D. All assets are selfmade ^^

Enjoy it and please tell me if you spot any bugs. Maybe you can tell me what to do better next time as well. 

PS: I know that the player trail is sometimes not rendered, but I tried to fix it and didnt find any solution.
